description.black-white:
The user employs its psychic power to
average its Defense and Sp. Def stats
with those of its target’s.

The user employs its psychic power to
average its Defense and Sp. Def stats
with those of its target’s.

The user employs its psychic power to
average its Defense and Sp. Def stats
with those of the target.

The user employs its psychic power to

description.sun-moon:
The user employs its psychic power to average its
Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user employs its psychic power to average its

description.sword-shield:
The user employs its psychic power to average its
Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

effect.full: Averages the user's unmodified Defense with the target's unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.shortEffect: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
